title: Edo State Art Gallery
address: Oba Market Road, Benin City, Edo State
description: A stunning collection of traditional and modern artworks, showcasing the cultural heritage of Edo State.

title: Benin Business District
address: Ring Road, Benin City, Edo State
description: A bustling hub of economic activity, full of local markets and modern businesses driving growth.

title: Edo Farming Community
description: A thriving agricultural community known for its yam, cassava, and palm produce.

title: Samuel Ogbemudia Stadium
address: Ikpoba Hill, Benin City, Edo State
description: Experience the excitement of local and national sporting events at this iconic stadium.

title: Royal Palace of the Oba of Benin
address: King’s Square, Benin City, Edo State
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site and seat of the Oba of Benin, representing centuries of tradition and history.

title: National Museum of Benin-City
address: King’s Square, Benin City, Edo State
description: Home to centuries-old artifacts and bronze sculptures from the Benin Kingdom.

title: Benin Moat
description: One of the world’s largest man-made earthworks, built for defense and legacy by ancient Benin people.

title: Igun Street
address: Igun Street, Benin City, Edo State
description: A UNESCO-recognized cultural site where bronze casting still thrives using traditional methods.
